title: Gyazo

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: The League of Legends launcher isn't even launching, once I click on League of Legends what happens is that a black rectangle appears around the Splash Screen. This is extremely annoying, and have fixed it quite a few times before it began to happen again. I have already contacted Riot support, who have helped me quite a bit but the problem persists. It stops for like two days before it begins to happen again

replies.body:
If I'm understanding right, you see the logo with the black background but then it never does anything else right?

If that's the case, go ahead and run through this [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) really quickly and make sure you're launching the client as admin. If that doesn't do much, keep talking with ol' Mouserat in your ticket and he'll get this sorted out with those logs!
Thanks for the help, it didn't do anything. But thank you anyways.

No worries, just because that first step didn't work for ya doesn't mean we don't have other options, this just means we gotta dig a little further ^_^.

Hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can take a look over some of your game logs to see what the main problem is. If you don't have the logs handy, make sure you generate those using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and send those over with your ticket!
